descriptionHtml:
Hi, this is my first mod that I share but i hope you'll like it. Sorry for my bad english.
The house's key is next to to the hatchery, underwater. You can see it in the pictures.
The containers are sure. Some navmesh are not perfect even if I try many things, sorry.
All the DLC are required and Flexible Container Mod. The link is in the description.

I create this mod with the help of others mods.
Thanks to this modders:
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28062/?]Flexible Container[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30599/?]Alchemy Clutter Resource[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?]Modders Resource Pack[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11618/?]EID_Activator[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/?]OpenBooks Resource[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17423/?]Paintings and Frames[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30602/?]Ingredients Wall Art Resource[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30600/?]Ingredients Drawer Resource[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30600/?]Ingredients Drawer Resource[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26729/?]Modders Ressource - Potions Rack[/url]﻿
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007/?tb=feed&pUp=1]Darkfox127[/url]﻿ for his tutorials.
I hope i don't forget anyone!
[color=#ff0000]This house is located at the Ilinalka Lake so you can have problem with others mods using this place!
If you take the normal version and want to change to NPC or Complete version don't forget to take everything you placed in the house or it will disapear!
The Complete Version (3.0) contains [u]Nudity.[/u] You can turn ON/OFF Nudity by the chain that you can see in Pictures. NPC re-equip their clothes/armors by enter in cells, wait or travel.[/color]
Have fun!
author: Frenchy34
